titles: Catholicks no idolaters, or, A full refutation of Doctor Stillingfleet's unjust charge of idolatry against the Church of Rome.
author: Godden, Thomas, 1624-1688.
notes: Attributed to Thomas Godden. Cf. DNB.

keywords: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699. --  Discourse concerning the idolatry practised in the Church of Rome.
